Purpose: To quantify catecholamines and their metabolites for diagnosing and assessing adrenal gland disorders such as pheochromocytoma, paraganglioma, and neuroblastoma.
Container: 24-hour urine collection container with 25 mL concentrated HCl preservative, kept refrigerated
Equipment: Analytical balance; centrifuge; automated chemistry analyzer (LC-MS/MS or HPLC); calibrated micropipettes; pH meter/pH strips
